Hi Diane, All you need to do is expense the $175 to professional costs to clear the asset. In about 2000, the rules for handling incorporation costs changed. I think Section 3064 paragraph 12 of the old CICA Handbook (I no longer have a Handbook to verify this) excluded incorporation costs from intangible assets. It used to be they were capitalized and amortized over time. Now they are expensed for the most part.
